column5: its only 30-40km winds...  quinte isnt that big...  youll just get sprayed a lot...

They are calling for 50k sustained on Sunday... there will be 6 footers at the ferry and substancially bigger waves down Adolphus... and Quinte aint like Lake O, the waves are much closer together than the big lake... HH

you should be able to find SOME calm waters to fish... just have to bang your way out there...  i know what kinda waves will be out... same as what we get on lake st.francis... the kind that get you airborn... and make you walk funny the next day...lol

Yup, there will be fishable waters, yah just gotta know where to launch... unfortuantely, it will restrict us to only a few areas, but it is still way better than watching fishin shows on the weekend! HH

So for all who are planning on going to the Texas Grill again on Saturday night, what time should we plan for?  7:00 ish?  Who can confirm they will be going as Pikeslayer would like to join us as he will be in the area?  Wayne, Terry, Lloyd, Jose, Paul????  Someone needs to take the trophy from us this year
Okay, looks like 6 p.m. for anyone interested in going.  Bring your appetite for steak, they make a mean one
I'm having steak now
Keep eating you'll need it to weight down the Bow of that boat with those winds.
You calling my fluffy there BUSTER?  Them fighting words lol

I hear via BBM from CCMT that the wind has calmed down and the area they are fishing is good (bbm msg was at 3pm).  He's even got a nice big pickereye and pic's to show off when they all get back from the weekend.
OH boy last year my bill was over $110.00 when the cab finally showed up.... We closed the bar.

GBW / Young-whon - I'll be there for "early" whatever that is... I'm DYING...  I'll be coming straight from sudbury... deer huntin' /  steelie huntin'....  FishFarmer - I'll stay the week with you and show you where they are!
YOUNG ONE - msg me yo digits...
don't forget the deer jerkey and smoked raimbow when you come.  I'll text you y_o's cell #
Fish farmer I'll pm you a few tips so your not going in blind. I'll be pulling the boat on the the 20 th after a fish then put her away and get ready for Cuba
Thanks Lloyd, Much appreciated. Everything helps us old boys. I think I'm going to stay more in the bay than in the Reach. OH and you and the Mrs. have a good and safe trip to Cuba.
getting closer  and as usual with Lloyd it's getting closer and closer..  when are we going now tuesday morning.....LOL  ok Thursday morning...LOL  can't wait
I'm ready!  wait, I'm not packed at all yet but who cares.  why can't it be the 18th already...
I will be there on the 17th through 20th.what kind of boat will you be in out there?
I'll be in "the big white mallow" AKA young_one's big white Tracker.
Where are you staying Mike? HH
We only got 2 sheepies on Thursday... Sun up to sundown...
Picton harbor Inn and I just happened to book it in August too  Will be with GlennK,Memart and Slowpoke.  Looking forward to seeing some good folks once again.
I love that place!! I hope they still have the steak special on.
I hope so too Brian.  Looks like we won't be arriving until late Friday now, after work (why does work always get in the way of fishing   )
I'm here now at picton harbour inn, can't wait for tomorrow.
see everyone friday morning.
Um, more like lunch or later for my group...  *edit to add* don't forget the ice como plz
I have it in the truck
Had a great   outing with U @ ME Guide Sunday, was a smooth day fishing without any problems what so ever, 2 Thumbs up to Lloyd  . Good luck to all you this Wk-end...
Forecast is lookin like we will have a bit of a "walleye chop"! http://www.theweathernetwork.com/weather/caon0540?ref=topnav_weather_savedcity  HH
At least the weather seems to be stable.....stable winds at 30 to 55K everyday this week??!!  Guess the Gortex will get a workout. Next boat will have full windshield.
my plans have been changed and I will not be able to make it.  feel free to let it go to anyone else, my loss...
Chop?? LOL    55 is a little breazy

Well, as the time draws nearer, it looks like it's definately going to have a bit of a chop going on.... I especially like it when the wind blows the white caps off of the top of the wave... thank goodness Quinte hardly ever gets rough in west or south west winds! On the bright side, these forecast winds should keep some of the "less hardy" types off the water and open up space for those of us who missed our recent head examinations... and if it does rain on us, we won't get wet... the wind will blow it right off of us! (Note to self... bring extra booze!) HH
im not sure i can get out there this year , no time, work is crazy and boat already put away  .. maybe sneek in a ride with a pal or two
I think we're meeting up for supper on Saturday night with Terry and the gang aswell.  Can't remember the name of the restaurant!!
If Lloyd has anything to do with it ... that would be Gus's !
It would be great to see you there Wayne.
Thanks Paul... I'm working on it but have a years worth of backlog to schedule and work around... but I'm getting closer to being there and taking my spot back !    (that means I'm up 2nd !)
after your dinner, come by for a fire.  that is if we can get one lit...  lol

I have decided to go one week later later Roy as the fishing has slowed over the last few yrs around the 11th and 12th.There seems to be more success towards the end of November.  Last year when we went around November 12th is was so warm we had to peel off the survival suits.  I will be there Nov 17.18.19 and 20th.  Hope to see y'a there Papa Smurf.
Do you want to go back to the Texas Grill Joey?
Ya, I think that's the one we usually go to Saturday night.  Where you staying for the  weekend Mike?
Picton Harbour Inn
Jesus.. the PHI is going to hell in a hand basket !
That is where we are staying too,they have wireless internet for those who have laptops or lap dances or lap dogs

Sorry to but in here guys but.....I was always wondering about staying in the picton harbour inn. Do they have boat launch and docking and what are the accommodations like. What is the walleye fishing like there now. Thanks
the free boat launch (and a nice one) is just around the corner from it and there is docking too  I heard the fishing has been slow but it always picks up around November
Rooms are booked WAY in advance at PHInn.. Lloyd booked ours back in August. If you're wanting to stay there I'd get on the phone...
Thanks guys now can I go out on a limb and ask where from there do you go to drop your line. Do you go as far up as Hay Bay. Thanks again

Depends on the boat and what the weather allows you to do. Many a fish have been caught in front of the first cement factory as soon as you start out of Picton. You can then continue on towards Hay bay and go "up" towards Deseronto or you can bear right and go down the straight beyond the ferry and use 2 lines per person down there. Some years we've been all the way down to the gap that goes out into Lake Ontario to get on fish... but not in recent years. Late fall they are usually well up to the ferry or close.
Thanks again for your help. We fished a couple years ago from Merland. Water rough and Merlin rough need not say more. Thanks so much

Looks like I'm going to miss you guys again this year. I'll be there 20,21,22,23. staying at Harbor Inn small apartment#401. We used to get the penthouse#601 but it's rented out now  If you want a good breakfast, harbor inn restaurant is the place. Save me some fish guys, don't catch them all. I just need one big one. Not a sheephead
We'll try to leave you a couple Dave. How about some silver bass or perch?
Or, we could catch all the wet socks and leave you the sheepies... so you could "play lambs" all day! HH
So who is going down early on the Friday - and is there a spot in a boat?  I'll make you a star...
young_one and I are but that all depends on what time you call early.
Gezz, you guys are all heart   Just save me one  , but if I have to take the back seat, I'll take a lamb
I should be there for the a day fish just making arrangements.  I'll have some Blue Berry muffins with me.
Don't forget the "DR." Fil! HH
I will be fishing with Lloyd and staying in Picton
Ya rub it in some more why dont ya.
Oh I'll be there and full of common sense advice.
Planning on "pre-fishing" Quinte over the next couple of weeks before the main event.
Terry, I thought you guys were going to be there the week before us? Did yo guys change your plans? HH
No I was the first one on this thread to say 18 19 20 looks like you guys changed to be there the same time as me...thanks...LOL
Oh sure Terry, use my own words against me... like that's fair! LMAO Is it the usual cast of characters you will be going out with Terry... perhaps a visit to Perfect Vue to see the sights!? HH
Lloyd, Terry, Jose, Lexxington same as last year
Terry - That was great! LMAO!!
Gottcha! HH
Link, don't forget that red dress...
wishing I hadn't winterized the boat  maybe ... hmmm... thinking...  a possibility.
"The Dr???? That thing hasn't caught a fish on quinte in 10 years!!"  According to Joe they don't work.......lol
I wouldn't listen to him Mike... dude don't know squat! HH
Yah never know... you may have to slide over a bit and make room for one more...
good luck Wayne!
now that would be nice
It would Terry... and I'm workin on it. Lots of ducks to line up yet, even with it being a year this week that I had to bail on last years trip.. email me the current plan(s).
we might have a bed still if needed Wayne.  Not saying who's bed but I'm sure Bitsmith2 and Linc are looking for company...
I'd like to meet you Wayne.  If you crawl in with me, just know that I'm the OUTSIDE spoon.  If you're looking to pitch, you lookin' for GBW.
I don't switch hit and I'm NOT a catcher!
You're some fuunny guys.... but my true friends    keep me in mind and they left a spot open for me.. hotel and boat ! Thanks lads !
Is this here non-boater included in the "we"?  Why am I having flashbacks to public school and not getting picked for soccer?...

if you are looking to hook up with others for the trip  this is a good place to start  state what you are looking for, LIKE  looking fora spot on a boat or boats for 3 days  looking for spot in a cottage for 2 days  looking for free beer and someone to drag my butt onto the boat in the morning..see free beer to know why..LOL or what ever else you are hoping for...
I can get there.  I need a spot to sleep.  I need 72hrs in a boat.  I can def. drag asses to boats,  I'm hardcore.
ps - the 10th is a full moon - it will be three-quater come the 18th w/e - lots of light for the night...
Now, insert full moon jokes.
Full moon......Humm, count me in
Well,something will be in.
You must be confused. How would you remember anything? I seem to recall you were the one passed out on the couch with the stuff on your face at 8pm .....

Never thought about asking for free beer before Terry, didn't know it was allowed on the board.   Hmmmm   Looking for free beer. Can drink just about anything if it's cold enough. Prefer Molson products. Anyone help a guy out? Vodka is fine as well.
um, the pic's showed me...     besides, all of you were all ready for Asianian noodles anyway... it must have been the mustard that did me in...

So here is what I'm looking for/need/like to have for that weekend. ride there (no gas money needed) as a non-boater, I need a spot in a boat (not going to fish off the docks all day, I can do that at any old place) room to sleep (just need to be dry with a roof over me, again free or best rate) free beer (any kind that free and cold) food (we can catch it but it might not taste good so) I'll bring mustard to stop for cheep smokes, you can buy and I won't feel bad. a tootblind blined, deaf.....  scratch that as I don't want to go through all that again. oh and I will need a trolling reel with a line counter all spooled up and reay to go.
I saw that pic !!! Never seen anyone that "relaxed" before.
it took a few years of practice but I'm getting the hang of it now.
fishnsled can you handle american beer coors light

yUp... it looks like we have two dates, with our little "group" arriving on Nov 18th, 19th and 20th. LLoyd, I had no idea that you were having health concerns and I am genuinely pleased that things are good now. I will be booking our little love nest at Perfect Vue some time today... Terry, Wayne and Lloyd... sorry it's not working out, but at this point, it is what it is. To the guys who have been pm'ing me about this trip, I need to know numbers so I can reserve a cottage suitable for our needs... I also need to let the dominatrix know the dates so she can get her various accoutrements tuned up and in proper working order. Young-one... get yer mom to stock up on noodles... HH
Skeeter, wear the leather this time... the whips and ball gager could also use a cleaning... just sayin. HH
And the gimp mask!!!  Don't forget the pink gloves Joe.
Sure! I drink that water all the time.    Putting in for Friday Nov. 18th as a day off and will let you know asap. Will be there that weekend, just a matter of arrival time.

Amount of free booze is directly correlated to amount of time on water (as a non-boater!)  ... you guys don't know how lucky you are that I'm just a little more interested in fishing...[sinisterlaugh]
***UPDATE**** Our cottage at Perfect Vue is booked, with our happy little gorup of 7 confirmed anglers and Lincoln. As mentioned, we will be arriving on Nov. 18th and departing on Nov. 20th. HH
woo hoo, road trip!  wait... or is it boat trip!?!?
Paul, Roy and I will be at our usual haunt, and will be meeting up with Terry and the gang probably the Saturday night for supper, then smores around the campfire

we have a camp fire too but just not sure by that time of day/night who can light one!  either way, we do have "the big white mallow", then "mellow mallow" and "aw man not you mallow" boats ready to roll! Dang, I need to get the radio's from Dann!!!!
prob because someone ripped Mercman a new one in PM about his post.  It wasn't right but...  So Mike is just pointing it out...
We are a month out from our trip... thanks to Spiel for pinning this! So, who's in?! HH
~~~Won't mind showing up this year, making plans to hit Lake Clear near Eaganville about the same time =, won't know for sure till early Oct.

I will be there what ever date is decided... Unless it's frozen over of course
Count me in for those dates!
Can't make everyone happy...  Whoever decides these things.... Just pick... Then plans can be made/changed...
How about the 25th, 26th and 27th?
I'm in for May
Hey, we could book the place for every weekend, and have the longest lasting G2G in history That way everyone could make it for at least 1 weekend.
I have 4 weekends vacation left, so yeah that works for me
These dates are fine as are any dates in November. The sooner I know which ones, the easier to book off the days needed.

The dates were posted at the beginning of the thread. We'll never all be in agreement. That's the way it works and some peoples' feelings will be hurt because you're not using THEIR dates. Have you ever registered for a fishing tourney where they've asked you which dates would be the most convenient for you? Lakair G2G dates are set and people either can make it or they can't. Most people get there somehow. We've been doing this long enough to know. On the other hand.....you can try to please everyone and this thread will last and last and last. Walleye season closes sometimes though so....  From personal experience, the people who will have crusaded for a specific date will in all likelihood have something important come up that weekend and will not show up.
As far as I know those dates work for me too
November 18 - 20th????  Finally, one I can put down on the calendar and make! Sleeping in the back of my truck for the weekend, perfect!  Cheers, Ron...

I know that you guys are set on November and we are getting word and some pics posted on another forum of good size walleyes being caught east of the ferry.  I'm going to try and get out this weekend, however I will let you know what is happening as it develops. I am thinking that October will also be a very good month for monster walleye.  Regards, Sam

Hey Joe he was holding off posting till I got a clean bill of health from the heart doctor.  All is good now and I guess you know what date we are going ) it was the only weeekend I had open in November.
Throwin' my hat in the ring...
I think I just heard a scream that sounded like it could have been young_one...
can't wait! i found these deals online, should be deadly in november:    not sure if they work with the multicoloured marshmallows though..
so  what date are you guys shooting for  or are we looking at 2 dates......

It looks like the majority are fine with the 18, 19th, 20th. I'd say those are the dates. All in favour?  Thanks for getting this started Joe.  PS - Glad to hear things are OK Lloyd. Scarey stuff when dealing with the ticker.
I just heard the Link got a new set of these to celebrate the weekend too...
Are these for you nipples Geoff???? Which cabin/room/place are you staying at? I don't won't to be too close....
if they were, they still wouldn't be near as nice as what you wore last year...
WE ARE BOOKED IN AT THE PICTON HARBOUR INN http://prince-edward-county.com/?page_id=947

Hey folks, Well, we are fast approaching that time of year again and as such, I was hoping that we could establish a date for our November GTG. I know it's too early to be posting a sticky, but in order to secure accomadation, we should start thinkin about a date. HH
X2
Oct 2nd is to early.  I vote for 11, 12, 13 of Nov.  Some of us could make it a 3 day'er.  Or at least pitch it to the misses as one.
So? Establish a date already Joe. If you ask people what they'd like you'll never get a consensus. Just grab the bull by the b.. uhh horns.
OK, Phil has the dates. Lock'em in.
Good dates Phil,as it wont interfer with the deer hunt.
You are absolutely correct Roy and I'll "third" Fil's suggestion of Nov. 11th, 12th and 13th. SO, the next big question is... WHERE ARE WE GOING TO STAY!!!!! This should get fun fast! HH
phil thats usually our regular g2g dates anyways !!! im in for sure its bbeen a few years since i was at the OFC quinte g2g !! ...
Hmmmmm, November walleye on Quinte, lemme think.......Uhhhh......No thanks!

Hmmmm, was HH looking for date opinions or just opinions.  If the latter I would like to change my answer.  And for supporting my new biz I would like to sponsor this event and give everyone going a split shot.

Ya know Chris, we could put you on to some spotted carp that weekend... I know where they hide! But then, you'd be stuck reeling in something that in no way resembles a big wet sock and you might get too tired! HH
If it's great company you're after you can't go wrong Phil, IMHO!  But as for the fish/fishing...... "no comment!"    Just thought I'd add to our weekend conversation Joe, you know where I stand.
I know... no worries, I like wet socks! HH
Crap....I'm out...can't that weekend!
Maybe that's what I should have said....
How can you do that with your camera? Are you a contortionist?
Damn...and I miss out on a split shot too???
crap we already settled with Lloyd we are going 18 19 20th............  and I do think that was the same date last year........double crap

Well isn't that great for youse guys... never really occured to any of you to perhaps let the rest of the class in on the little secret? (Dam Roy, you were so right!) Ok, so in an effort to build a consensus, do we stay with the 11th, 12th and 13th or move to the following weekend so we can watch/hear Lloyd blow his air horn at the morons trolling in his way? HH
Hmmmm, maybe I should go, I haven't been able to find my split shot for months, thinking I lost it!
I can make it if it's the following weekend....  BB#4...I need one of those...

yes i checked it was the following weekend the last 2 times i did the g2g..im good for either weekend fishing is the priority for me so lets do it !!! pick a date phil,the fishing is awesome from then till freeze up....anyways

We were going to start a thread some time this week...  Lloyd has to use weekends that are not booked for charters so, he was dealing with what he had to work with and being the same as last year we thought would most likely work
Ok... so lets try this again... it's like herding freakin cats here!... Is everybody ok with the 18th, 19th and 20th? HH
